title: Get Ready for the Fantasy TV Bubble | The Watch (Ep. 295)
description:
The Ringer’s Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald talk about the news that Chris Evans may be out as Captain America (3:47) and the recent influx of fantasy television (9:17). Then they recap the latest episode of ‘Better Call Saul’ (38:42), and Chris helps Andy decide if he should go see ‘A Star Is Born’ or ‘Venom’ this weekend (46:45).
Read David Shoemaker on ‘Venom’ here.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
